programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Sitcom about a girl called Tori Vega and her life at an elite Hollywood high school for the performing arts. Tori is chosen to appear on a new game show called Brain Squeezers and all her friends want to be on her team. Annoyed with them nagging her, she finally picks Andre, Beck, and Robbie. When Tori turns up to sign in, she finds Jade already there masquerading as her! Jade steals Toris teammates and Tori is left with Trina, Sinjin, and Cat. Then it turns out that the game show is not as much fun as they had all hoped. Is it worth sticking around when its no longer enjoyable for the gang?.

programme.title: Sam and Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat is an American teen sitcom, a crossover spin-off of both iCarly and Victorious. Sam and Cat meet under very uncommon circumstances, become friends and then roommates. They want to start their own business to be more independent and become part-time babysitters. Since then their lives have completely changed and are filled with all kinds of comic situations and various unbelievable and curious adventures, as looking after kids is not easy. Watch young charges playing mischievous tricks on Sam and Cat and have fun!

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Raph is freaking out! He wanted to fight everyone, but now hes up against his brothers, and its the worst. Kitsune and her gang the Purple Dragons captured Mikey, Donnie, and Leo and used mind control devices to send them into the Mutant Battle Arena. They chase Raph through the arena and out to the street where he uses the Turtle Tank as a getaway car. Raph realizes hes in too deep and must turn to an unlikely source for help - the snobby Pigeon Pete! Together, they form a multi-step plan in which Pete will steal the mind control devices right from under the Purple Dragons noses while Raph distracts all the Mutants in the arena. But things dont go quite as planned and its up to Raph to save everyone he loves! Can he find a way to disarm the mind control devices and save everyone before its too late?

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Ray Fillet is attacked in Central Park by a mutant turtle! Donnies busy with his robotics project: turning Metalhead into a spider-bot. Wingnut bursts in and tells the Turtles to come quick- Ray is hurt! A woozy Ray blames the Ninja Turtles, and the Mutanimals start a fight with the confused brothers. But when Rays REAL attacker appears, a mutant snapping turtle named TOKKA, he fights everyone... until his watch starts beeping and he escapes. The Turtles tail him, ending up on the Staten Island ferry. After a big fight, Tokkas trapped. But while questioning him, Tokka explodes into OOZE, leaving only a baby turtle and his watch. Donnies brothers ask him to hack it and find clues about Tokka, which he says is impossible! Later, Donnie gets a location pin from Wingnut and follows it to an abandoned factory on Staten Island. He finds her and ANOTHER TOKKA that he cleverly takes out! Donnie thinks theyre safe until MORE Monster Mutanimals emerge! Could Donnies day get any worse?"

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBobs relaxing beach day turns into a mission to clean up all the litter on Goo Lagoon. After leaving every surface spotless, SpongeBob notices one pesky ball of trash that evades his capture. SpongeBob hunts down the trash ball in a chaotic chase around town that ends with trash spilling all over the beach! Its revealed that Plankton was inside the trash ball all along. Larry forces SpongeBob and Plankton to clean up the beach...again! // Pearl promises her classmates Krabby Patties after their strict lunch lady, Lenore, is injured. Mr. Krabs and SpongeBob agree to cafeteria duty, however, theyre closely supervised by Lenore and she forbids outside food! SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs try to sneakily cook Krabby Patties but Lenore catches them, sparking a food fight! As the food flies, Lenore tastes a Krabby Patty...and loves it! They move the food fight to the Krusty Krab. Mr. Krabs is thrilled - the more patties they throw, the more he sells!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester are a pair of hilariously individual twins who live in a weird and wonderful alternate reality where your neighbour could be a pair of disgruntled trousers or your best friend a floating cloud of bottom burp. But, unlike their friends and neighbours, Best and Bester have the unique ability to choose a new body every single day and, in doing so, experience life in a completely different way.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: After breaking up with Granny Tentacles, GrandPat is heartbroken. To get the old couple back together, Squidina turns The Patrick Show into a dating game, where GrandPat has to compete against Slappy and Larry for Grannys love. // Bikini Bottom is ravaged with an ice cream eating beast. The Ice Cream Man and Ice Cream King team up to capture this mysterious monster. Squidina tags along to film their mission, then is put in a compromising position when she learns that Patrick has been eating the citys ice cream all along.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe start the process to impress Captain Perfect and save their mission, but they clash over their different styles. As Max sees that Phoebe worked better with Captain Perfect, he decides that he will also be better off with a new partner, and summons his friend Gideon from Hiddenville. Gideon doesnt fit the superhero mold, however, so Max uses one of his gadgets to give him size and strength. But the setting is off, and Max shrinks Gideon to the size of an ant, forcing him to locate and save his impossible-to-see friend before Phoebe and Captain Perfect discover what hes done. Meanwhile, Chloe asks Booch and Jinx to try their best to bond with new crush BC, so they pretend to be wealthy like his family.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: All of Raphs wildest dreams are coming true in the underground Mutant Battle Arena! He gets to let loose, fighting the massive Mutanimals Bebop and Rocksteady; even the hug-loving Mondo Gecko joins in on the fun! Raph doesnt hold back, and he gets his butt kicked with a smile on his face. Not only that, hes getting some serious bling in exchange for being part of the fights - gold chains, new clothes, even his very own vehicle, the TURTLE TANK! This makes Donnie, Leo, and Mikey very suspicious, since Raph has kept everything a secret from them. But audiences love Raph, which pleases the crime boss Kitsune and her street gang, the Purple Dragons. They run the arena with the help of an obnoxious investor named Knox. But Raphs dream may become a nightmare, as Raph is oblivious to the fact that hes walked right into their trap!

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Halmoni develops a special connection with a dog, Tofu, at the Groom and Board. When its time to return the freshly-groomed pup to his owners, she makes a split decision to go on the run with him instead! Min and Will must distract Tofus owners with runaway chicks while Lil and Jack go looking for Halmoni. They discover that Tofu resembles Halmonis beloved childhood dog, Dubu, whom she had to leave behind in Korea. Can they rescue Tofu - and will Halmoni get to say her proper goodbye? // Eager to prove himself, Jack volunteers to run the Groom and Board alone for the day. Its supposed to be a chill day with no appointments - but the phone wont stop ringing! Unable to say no, Jack ends up taking in a chaotic giant snake, and multiple smaller pets - whom the snake sees as her dinner. Jack struggles to protect the little pets (and Halmoni) from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Living together for the first time, half-siblings Jack and Lily are pushed outside their comfort zones as they learn to coexist while navigating new family dynamics, friends, and endless hijinks all while helping run the familys pet grooming and boarding business. With guidance from their parents and grandmother, the two will learn about each others previously separate lives, blended identity, vibrant culture, and the importance of family.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: On Halloween, SpongeBob, Patrick, and a reluctant Squidward explore the "haunted" Chum Bucket. Plankton and Karen scare the trio down into Planktons basement lab where a ghostly portal accidentally opens, unleashing spirits into Bikini Bottom! Realizing the ghosts just want to have one night of trick-or-treating, SpongeBob and crew set out to give them a Halloween to remember before theyre returned to their ghostly portal.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: When Max and Phoebe are due to attend Parent-Teacher night at school, Chloe asks to have her friends over to the house unsupervised. Despite being told no, she secretly invites Jinx and Booch over while her guardians are out. At school, Max convinces a reluctant Phoebe to lead an art demonstration for the parents, under the watchful eye of the schools vindictive superintendent. Meanwhile, Jinx discovers the Air Lair, and before Chloe can offer a good cover story, he assumes evil spies are secretly living at their home, and plan to target the parents at the school that night. Jinx races to the school to stop his imagined threat, disrupting Phoebes demonstration and putting the Thundermans cover jobs in jeopardy.

Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Loud House

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Living together for the first time, half-siblings Jack and Lily are pushed outside their comfort zones as they learn to coexist while navigating new family dynamics, friends, and endless hijinks all while helping run the familys pet grooming and boarding business. With guidance from their parents and grandmother, the two will learn about each others previously separate lives, blended identity, vibrant culture, and the importance of family.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: On Halloween, SpongeBob, Patrick, and a reluctant Squidward explore the "haunted" Chum Bucket. Plankton and Karen scare the trio down into Planktons basement lab where a ghostly portal accidentally opens, unleashing spirits into Bikini Bottom! Realizing the ghosts just want to have one night of trick-or-treating, SpongeBob and crew set out to give them a Halloween to remember before theyre returned to their ghostly portal.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: The Thundermans are excited to meet High Tide, a legendary superhero who surfaces at their door after being away on an extended mission. He explains to them that he used to live in their house, and was the Protector of Secret Shores before they were. While they enjoy hearing about his adventures, things turn when High Tide says that the house is rightfully his, and they must leave. Max and Phoebe explain that they are the towns new superheroes, and while exiting High Tide promises to do whatever it takes to regain his former position. Meanwhile, Booch has convinced Jinx to join her in a water protest at the school, but they go too far and find themselves in real danger. When High Tide shows up to rescue them, he only makes things worse, forcing the Thundermans to save the day and relieve High Tide once and for all.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Carly hosts her own home-grown web show, iCarly. She lives with her twenty-something brother/guardian Spencer and produces her Web casts from a makeshift third-floor loft studio. Grappling with adolescence, she never aimed to gain fame as a rising star/underground celebrity to kids. As events unfold in the pilot, it all happens by accident when a teacher puts her in charge of the school talent show. She and her sassy best bud Sam turn the audition process into a show, which Carlys tech savvy smitten friend Freddy tapes -- including their hilarious banter and great chemistry -- and posts on the Web without telling the girls. The on-line audience clamors for more, and a pop phenomenon blooms, with Carly and sidekick Sams regular Web casts ultimately featuring everything from comedy sketches and talent contests to interviews, recipes, and problem-solving.

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Sitcom about a girl and her life at an elite Hollywood high school for the performing arts. Tori is worried she will forget the words when she is invited to sing the national anthem at a televised basketball game. But Tori should be more concerned about being dragged across the field by the teams mascot - a Saint Bernard dog. She is then asked to sing on a TV show. But when the host tells the audience that he is going to pull a prank on her, can Beck and Andre save her from humiliation?.

programme.title: Sam and Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat is an American teen sitcom, a crossover spin-off of both iCarly and Victorious. Sam and Cat meet under very uncommon circumstances, become friends and then roommates. They want to start their own business to be more independent and become part-time babysitters. Since then their lives have completely changed and are filled with all kinds of comic situations and various unbelievable and curious adventures, as looking after kids is not easy. Watch young charges playing mischievous tricks on Sam and Cat and have fun!

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Donnies trapped in a mad scientists lab by the Monster Mutanimals Tokka, Rahzar, Scale Tail, Antrax and Wyrm who are after Wingnuts blood. Meanwhile, Leo, Mikey and Raph try to get pizza but the shop owner is furious: theyve made a mess of the place too many times! But the Turtles have never been there before! Theyre confused until another Tokka wrecks the place in a huge fight before exploding into ooze...and then another Tokka arrives! In the lab, Donnie plans his escape but stumbles upon a video of Rahzar who explains the Monster Mutanimals are doomed unless they find the blood of a stable mutant... and they need Donatellos help! A real-life Rahzar lunges at Donnie, who fights him off until a whole pack of Monster Mutants shows up. The other three Turtles track their Tokka to the lab but are quickly captured. Donnie can only watch as his brothers are shoved into cages... and confronted by the creator of the Monster Mutanimals, the mad scientist Jordan Perry!

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale
programme.desc: When Keesha redecorates, the hamsters work to save their favorite play place (Kendricks old recliner) from being thrown out. // When a mama bird mistakes Lil Pal for her lost chick, the hamsters embark on a royal rescue to save their friend.

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: It is pure luck to have a genie to fulfill all wishes, to have two of them is something incredible. Leah is a little girl with a genie bottle necklace, which includes Shimmer and Shine, genie twins. Shimmer is a genie with blue eyes and pink hair, encouraging and passionate, she has a pet, a gibbon monkey Tala. Shine is her twin genie with purple eyes and blue hair, big animal lover. Her pet is a little Bengal tiger Nahal. Zac is Leahs neighbor with red hair and blue eyes, and her best human friend. Leah is making three wishes every day, genies are doing their best but the results are far from perfect, as genies are very young and unskilled. This is the source of awkward and comic situations, but in the end girls manage to get over all difficulties.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets
programme.desc: Rusty Rivets is a fantastic and picturesque animated series about Rusty who lives in Sparkton Hills along with his friend Ruby Ramirez, a robotic tyrannosaurid named Botasaur, and a group of smaller robots known as the Bits. Rusty is a smart inventor and a little genius who with the help of his amazing discoveries helps his friends out of difficulties. Rusty constructs robots of different sizes, forms and purposes, he is in love with science, technology and engineering. Together with his friend Ruby they can repair any old machinery and out-of-date equipment. Their splendid intellect arouses envy and toxic rivals do not play the game clean.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger
programme.desc: Henry Hart is a normal eighth grade student, with an out of school job that takes him on amazing adventures. His cool part time gig as Kid Danger, takes him on out of this world adventures as the sidekick-in-training to famous superhero Captain Man. They go on bizarre and crazy travels, battling criminals and villains that try to attack his hometown and Captain Man himself. Meanwhile at home, Henry has to stay in hiding, keeping his sidekick job as a secret from his best friends, Charlotte and Jasper, and little sister Piper. What exciting adventures will Kid Danger get up to with Captain Man and will be he be able to hide his alter ego from his friends and family?

Worse, his giant dinosaur tail knocks out power to the whole city, ruining Dimmadelphias prized Electric Light Ice Cream Float Parade. With Hazel feeling remorseful, Bary musters inspiration from his hero, the great Thomas Rex-ison, and uses his dinosaur smarts to try to save the day. // Hazel has planned a night of watching scary movies with her new friend, Jasmine, but it turns out Jasmine hates scary movies. Rather than change the plan, Hazel wishes Jasmine had no fears. When Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, the fears escape Jasmines mind, coming into the real world. Hazel tries fighting the fears off but learns its Jasmine who must face them to make them disappear. Now, shes got to talk her new friend into doing everything shes most afraid of, which gets the attention of Fear Itself!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Aang, Katara and Sokka have run out of money. Katara suggests Sokka get a job, and coincidentally, they meet a fisherman who is looking for someone to help him out with his fishing. But when the fisherman recognizes Aang as the Avatar, he blames Aangs absence for all of the troubles of the last 100 years, and Aang runs away on his glider. Katara follows on Appa, and when she finds him, Aang begins to reveal life before he was frozen in the iceberg. Meanwhile, Prince Zuko and Lieutenant Jee get into a fight, but Iroh breaks it up. Soon thereafter, the Lieutenant and the rest of the crew gain a newfound respect for their leader after learning of his past

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester are a pair of hilariously individual twins who live in a weird and wonderful alternate reality where your neighbour could be a pair of disgruntled trousers or your best friend a floating cloud of bottom burp. But, unlike their friends and neighbours, Best and Bester have the unique ability to choose a new body every single day and, in doing so, experience life in a completely different way.

programme.title: Harvey Beaks
programme.desc: Welcome to the peck-uliar world of Harvey Beak, a moderately mellow young bird who flies around his magical forest home of Littlebark Grove, with best-bird friends Fee and Foo, a pair of boisterous twins. The three feathered friends are always looking for new things to do, zooming around the forest embarking on adventures. With many other animals living in the forest, theres plenty of new characters and creatures for the trio to meet, often involving them on their mischievous escapades. Harvey lives with his parents, Irving Beaks and Miriam Beaks.

programme.title: Wallykazam!
programme.desc: Wallykazam! follows the adventures of a troll named Wally and his pet dragon, Norville, who live in a forest with giants, goblins, ogres, sprites and other mythical creatures. Wally uses his magic stick to make words come to life on screen that start with a specific letter, sound or rhyme. Each episode features a new set of magic words that Wally uses to playfully transform the world around him.

programme.title: Winx Club
programme.desc: Meet Bloom, a girl from Earth, who after she finds out that she is a fairy joins Alfea College on the planet Magix- a magical universe that is inhabited by fairies, witches and other mythical creatures. At Alfea College, fairy warriors from all over the universe study to improve their supernatural powers and here Bloom befriends five other fairies - Stella, the fairy of the Sun, Flora, the fairy of nature, Tecna, the fairy of technology, Musa, the fairy of music and Aisha, the fairy of waves. Together, this group of girls known as the Winx, become best friends and the force to be reckoned with as they experience incredible adventures while defending their universe from varous enemies.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: Max and the Midknights
programme.desc: MAX and THE MIDKNIGHTS is a medieval action-adventure comedy about a girl named Max and her group of friends, the Midknights, as they embark on a quest to help a neighboring kingdom of gnomes and discover that their own kingdom could be in danger.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger
programme.desc: Henry Hart is a normal eighth grade student, with an out of school job that takes him on amazing adventures. His cool part time gig as Kid Danger, takes him on out of this world adventures as the sidekick-in-training to famous superhero Captain Man. They go on bizarre and crazy travels, battling criminals and villains that try to attack his hometown and Captain Man himself. Meanwhile at home, Henry has to stay in hiding, keeping his sidekick job as a secret from his best friends, Charlotte and Jasper, and little sister Piper. What exciting adventures will Kid Danger get up to with Captain Man and will be he be able to hide his alter ego from his friends and family?

programme.desc: In The Void, Shadow intercepts Sonics latest Shatterspace transverse, for a personal face-to-fist encounter. Sonic assumes this Shadow is another distorted prism version of someone he knows until Shadow calls Sonic by name.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: After following the sound of Patricks voice into the Time Closet, Tinkle stumbles on a time-travelling adventure. From Cave Pat to Pat-Tron to Pat The Hapless, Tinkles presence impacts a world of different Patricks throughout this epic journey through time. // Cecil and Bunny struggle to keep Patrick and Squidina away from the TV on "Spend Time With One Of Your Kids Day". While Bunny takes Patrick shopping, Cecil takes Squidina fishing. Their separate adventures converge at the mall, where the whole family discovers a virtual reality experience.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: When Granny Tentacles goes out for a spa day, Patrick volunteers to watch over her house. In a failed attempt to follow Grannys instructions, Patrick makes his way into her home, then brings Squidina inside too. Between breaking Grannys furniture, tearing out her toilet, and letting a wild animal out of its cage, Patrick destroys the entire house, just as Granny returns home to witness it. // Without seeing him, the Star family obliviously smashes up Plankton, leading him to forget who he is. When the injured, amnesic Plankton is saved and adopted by the Dartfish family, it does not take long for him to teach the overly polite family his evil ways. Meanwhile, Karen searches all over town for her missing husband.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel and Jasmine have planned their very first sleepover but Dev Dimmadome threatens to throw an even better party! To draw her classmates attention Hazel boasts that she lives in a luxury hotel and wishes her apartment building into The Wellsington Hotelsington Hotel. Now she must balance running the hottest hotel in Dimmadelphia and spending time with Jasmine and Winn before they check out of the friendship! // Hoping to win a class superlative, Hazel wishes to be famous at her school. Father Time cuts her a deal for 1,500 minutes of fame, but Principal Krentz is not happy about Hazels celebrity status and threatens to transfer her if she doesnt stop being a "distraction" by the end of lunch. With tons of time left on her wish, Nick of Time arrives with a solution: if Hazel acts like a New Yorker, her remaining minutes will turn into New York Minutes and pass faster. Can Hazel act New Yorky enough to beat the clock?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: After Sokka and Katara get sick due to being in the storm, Aang seeks out a cure and discovers he needs some frozen frogs in order to get them cured. Meanwhile, Zhao has been promoted to Admiral and he is using the Fire Nations best men to capture Aang, and he eventually succeeds. All hope seems lost for Aang and his friends, but there may just be a glimmer of hope when a strange blue spirit masked figure comes to Aangs rescue, but who could it possibly be?

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: In an effort to learn more about her missing mom, Clawdeen opens a portal in the catacombs.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester are a pair of hilariously individual twins who live in a weird and wonderful alternate reality where your neighbour could be a pair of disgruntled trousers or your best friend a floating cloud of bottom burp. But, unlike their friends and neighbours, Best and Bester have the unique ability to choose a new body every single day and, in doing so, experience life in a completely different way.

programme.title: Nella the Princess Knight
programme.desc: Nella the Princess Knight is a British-American animated childrens television series that follows adventurous life of fun-loving and fearless princess Nella who turns into a knight when necessary in order to protect her kingdom. Her main treasure is not her crown but her beloved friends- unicorn Trinket, steed Clod and Sir Garrett. Nella sees that no harm comes to her friends and all other citizens of her kingdom. Together with her friends they have fun, solve mysteries and overcome hardships without which life is impossible even in the happiest kingdom.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Action-packed animation. Four pizza-loving brothers, Raph, Leo, Donnie and Mikey, are mutant turtles who live in the sewers under the streets of New York City. Raph is the oldest of the brothers and also their leader. Leo is the sword-swinging trickster of the team. Donnie is the smartest of the group and Mikey is the youngest brother and also the joker of the bunch. The adventures they go on help them discover their mystic ninja powers and understand the world around them. They learn to work better as a team of heroes. Skills they will need when faced with the enemies who wish to defeat the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy
programme.desc: Guard Dog:When the Chameleon witnesses Snaptrap committing a crime in a neighboring town, he agrees to testify against him. Its up to Dudley to keep the Chameleon safe from Snaptrap on the long train ride to Petsburgh! But who will keep Dudley safe from the Chameleons weird habits?Dog Save the Queen:When the Chameleon threatens to relieve the Queen of England of her Crown Jewels, Dudley and Kitty are called in to assist B.U.F.F. - the British Undercover Fighting Force. But rooting out the Chameleon in a strange land proves to be quite challenging, especially with the language barrier!

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: When a young waterbender, named Katara, and her brother, Sokka, discover a giant iceberg while fishing for food around their homestead at the South Pole, they discover that there is a boy, named Aang, inside. Aang, they discover, is an airbender, (a group of people which were thought to be extinct). However, after a string of unfortunate events which puts the village in harms way, they soon learn that there is more to him than meets the eye. Will Aang prove his hidden abilities, or will he be thought as just a child?

Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: В городе происходит несколько нападений на инкассаторские машины. Налеты проводят дерзко, с убийствами. Дело дают в руки лучшего опера Киева Виктора Тарана, если он раскроет его, сможет претендовать на место начальника. А если банду не найдут в ближайшее время, то могут полететь головы вышестоящего начальства, так как обеспеченные влиятельные люди не любят терять свои деньги.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Оперативники находят машину, которую использовали грабители. Её владелец – алкоголик, который недавно отдал старое авто малознакомому парню. Один из бизнесменов, которому светит приговор, доносит генералу, кто меняет украденные из инкассаторских машин наличные. Если органы не захотят оказывать ему услугу, им придется объяснять прессе связь с крупными инвесторами, которые по стечению обстоятельств работают с менялами.

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Юмористическое скетч-шоу "На троих" - это зажигательные шутки и забавные истории, которые подсказывает сама жизнь. Персонажи "На троих" хорошо знакомы зрителям - это обычные врачи, гаишники, полицейские, офисный "планктон". Новые серии и десятки комических историй - в проекте "На троих" от актеров "Дизель Шоу"!

programme.title: Папа попал
programme.desc: Вас приветствует самое весёлое семейное телешоу "Папа попал". По правилам проекта участником шоу может стать абсолютно любой мужчина, у которого есть уставшая от жизни и бытовых проблем жена, а также минимум двое детей. В то время, как супруга уезжает отдыхать на далёкий и красивый курорт, ее муж начинает принимать на себя все обязанности своей благоверной. На протяжении 7 дней папа должен будет выполнять абсолютно все задания и поручения, которые обычно выполняет его жена. Уборка, стирка, поход за покупками, воспитание детей и поддержание уюта в доме - всё это теперь ляжет на сильные плечи украинских пап. Более того, участники шоу должны будут сделать еще и множество чисто мужских работ, которые долгие годы их просили выполнить их супруги. Починить забор, поклеить обои, отремонтировать автомобиль или научить ребёнка танцевать - всё это также ляжет на плечи наших мужчин-участников. Папа может? Посмотрим!

programme.title: Свадьба вслепую
programme.desc: Право быть счастливым имеет каждый. Но не каждый может осуществить его. "Свадьба вслепую" - это уникальный украинский социальный проект, который поможет разбитым сердцам создать новую крепкую семью. Однако его создатели сразу предупреждают о том, что даже у самой идеальной пары на проекте не всегда гарантирован успех в развитии отношений друг с другом.

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Юмористическое скетч-шоу "На троих" - это зажигательные шутки и забавные истории, которые подсказывает сама жизнь. Персонажи "На троих" хорошо знакомы зрителям - это обычные врачи, гаишники, полицейские, офисный "планктон". Новые серии и десятки комических историй - в проекте "На троих" от актеров "Дизель Шоу"!

programme.title: Экстрасенсы-детективы
programme.desc: Международная команда экстрасенсов берется за расследование! Когда нет ни одной зацепки, когда полиция бессильна, им удается распутать самые громкие дела. Чтобы вычислить убийцу, им не нужны доказательства и свидетели. Они приходят на помощь, когда уже нет надежды узнать правду. Экстрасенсы направят свои способности на помощь простым людям. Тем, чьи родные или знакомые погибли при загадочных обстоятельствах. В расследованиях принимают участие экстрасенсы из разных стран мира: Великобритании, Эстонии, Чехии, Украины, Белоруссии, России, Австралии, США, Азербайджана, Болгарии, Грузии. В каждом выпуске программы они не соревнуются, а помогают друг другу. Параллельно с парой экстрасенсов расследование ведет профессиональный криминалист. Вместе они найдут виновных и восстановят справедливость!

programme.title: Отважные
programme.desc: Сериал рассказывает о работе специального подразделения полиции, занимающегося проблемами домашнего насилия. Четыре главные героини помогают женщинам, детям и даже мужчинам, страдающим от тирании, побоев, унижений и других способов угнетения со стороны близких людей. Героини сериала будут попадать в сложные и опасные ситуации, спасая жизни и восстанавливая справедливость. Каждая женщина из этой четверки тоже прошла через насилие: у каждой – своя история, скелет в шкафу и сильная мотивация заниматься именно этим делом.

programme.title: Отважные
programme.desc: Сериал рассказывает о работе специального подразделения полиции, занимающегося проблемами домашнего насилия. Четыре главные героини помогают женщинам, детям и даже мужчинам, страдающим от тирании, побоев, унижений и других способов угнетения со стороны близких людей. programme.title: Короли палат
programme.desc: Поликлиника- место, где спасают жизни. Здесь работают два кардинально разных брата. Их отношения иногда доводят до слез, но чаще всего слезы появляются от смеха.

programme.title: Короли палат
programme.desc: Поликлиника- место, где спасают жизни. Здесь работают два кардинально разных брата. Их отношения иногда доводят до слез, но чаще всего слезы появляются от смеха.

programme.title: Спасатели
programme.desc: Сериал включает в себя приключения разных людей, которые в знойное лето отправились отдыхать на побережье Черного моря. В сюжете в глаза бросаются спасатели, которые всегда начеку спасти красавиц-девушек, но почему-то совершенно не настроены протянуть руку помощи остальным остронуждающимся. Выделяется и семья, оказавшаяся среди моря. Вместо того, чтоб сплотиться и выбраться из сложившихся обстоятельств, они ищут виновного в случившемся, а это тянет за собой новые семейные ссоры. Где же как не на пляже настоящая летняя атмосфера, приятная музычка, прохладные коктейли... Для тех, кому катастрофически этого не хватает - сериал "Спасатели".

programme.title: Отважные
programme.desc: Сериал рассказывает о работе специального подразделения полиции, занимающегося проблемами домашнего насилия. Четыре главные героини помогают женщинам, детям и даже мужчинам, страдающим от тирании, побоев, унижений и других способов угнетения со стороны близких людей. programme.title: Суббота
programme.desc: Юмористический сериал, герои которого - простая семья, на одну из суббот которой пришлась пятнадцатая годовщина свадьбы. На празднование такого важного события съезжается чуть ли не вся семья - дом ломится от родственников. В результате, праздник выходит из-под контроля, и по определенным причинам гостям приходится задержаться дольше, чем кто-либо мог ожидать. Интересно, что некоторые герои украинского сериала на 1+1 были бы не против быстрее уехать домой, но получается так, что каждую субботу происходит нечто, что заставляет задержаться их еще на неделю - и так каждый раз. Как долго один дом сможет выдержать такое количество гостей? А как насчет его хозяев?

programme.title: Суббота

programme.title: Дизель-шоу
programme.desc: Каждый выпуск "Дизель-шоу" - это час настоящего народного юмора в исполнении блестящих резидентов шоу. Среди участников "Дизель-шоу" талантливые актеры, известные КВНщики и самобытные шоумены. Вся команда, бесспорно, прекрасно чувствует друг друга, а потому так легко и непринужденно дарит хорошее настроение своим зрителям. Концерты Дизель-шоу давно уже стали желанным событием в каждом городе Украины, а поэтому билеты на такие мероприятия раскупаются мгновенно. Поэтому лучше купить билеты заранее.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Раненый грабитель пытается самостоятельно вытянуть шар из ноги, затрагивает артерию и умирает. Милиция приезжает к нему на квартиру слишком поздно. Таран уверен, что последний налет организовал Таир, пытаясь отвести от себя подозрения. Но ни у одного из отделов никаких серьезных доказательств нет. Таран предлагает объединить свои усилия, чтобы найти убийц как можно скорее.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Убийство двух оперативников, самоубийство подозреваемого и арест коллеги при попытке незаконно купить оружие – все это сваливается на Тарана за одну ночь. В квартире беглеца грабителя находят целый "арсенал", теперь операм становится неясно, зачем грабителям надо было нападать на участкового. Они начинают расследовать его возможной причастности к налетам.

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Юмористическое скетч-шоу "На троих" - это зажигательные шутки и забавные истории, которые подсказывает сама жизнь. Персонажи "На троих" хорошо знакомы зрителям - это обычные врачи, гаишники, полицейские, офисный "планктон". Новые серии и десятки комических историй - в проекте "На троих" от актеров "Дизель Шоу"!

programme.title: Экстрасенсы-детективы
programme.desc: Международная команда экстрасенсов берется за расследование! Когда нет ни одной зацепки, когда полиция бессильна, им удается распутать самые громкие дела. Чтобы вычислить убийцу, им не нужны доказательства и свидетели. Они приходят на помощь, когда уже нет надежды узнать правду. Экстрасенсы направят свои способности на помощь простым людям. Тем, чьи родные или знакомые погибли при загадочных обстоятельствах. В расследованиях принимают участие экстрасенсы из разных стран мира: Великобритании, Эстонии, Чехии, Украины, Белоруссии, России, Австралии, США, Азербайджана, Болгарии, Грузии. В каждом выпуске программы они не соревнуются, а помогают друг другу. Параллельно с парой экстрасенсов расследование ведет профессиональный криминалист. Вместе они найдут виновных и восстановят справедливость!

programme.title: Отважные
programme.desc: Сериал рассказывает о работе специального подразделения полиции, занимающегося проблемами домашнего насилия. Четыре главные героини помогают женщинам, детям и даже мужчинам, страдающим от тирании, побоев, унижений и других способов угнетения со стороны близких людей. Героини сериала будут попадать в сложные и опасные ситуации, спасая жизни и восстанавливая справедливость. Каждая женщина из этой четверки тоже прошла через насилие: у каждой – своя история, скелет в шкафу и сильная мотивация заниматься именно этим делом.

programme.title: Отважные

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Раненый грабитель пытается самостоятельно вытянуть шар из ноги, затрагивает артерию и умирает. Милиция приезжает к нему на квартиру слишком поздно. Таран уверен, что последний налет организовал Таир, пытаясь отвести от себя подозрения. Но ни у одного из отделов никаких серьезных доказательств нет. Таран предлагает объединить свои усилия, чтобы найти убийц как можно скорее.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Убийство двух оперативников, самоубийство подозреваемого и арест коллеги при попытке незаконно купить оружие – все это сваливается на Тарана за одну ночь. В квартире беглеца грабителя находят целый "арсенал", теперь операм становится неясно, зачем грабителям надо было нападать на участкового. Они начинают расследовать его возможной причастности к налетам.

programme.title: Короли палат
programme.desc: Поликлиника- место, где спасают жизни. Здесь работают два кардинально разных брата. Их отношения иногда доводят до слез, но чаще всего слезы появляются от смеха.

programme.title: Спасатели
programme.desc: Сериал включает в себя приключения разных людей, которые в знойное лето отправились отдыхать на побережье Черного моря. В сюжете в глаза бросаются спасатели, которые всегда начеку спасти красавиц-девушек, но почему-то совершенно не настроены протянуть руку помощи остальным остронуждающимся. Выделяется и семья, оказавшаяся среди моря. Вместо того, чтоб сплотиться и выбраться из сложившихся обстоятельств, они ищут виновного в случившемся, а это тянет за собой новые семейные ссоры. Где же как не на пляже настоящая летняя атмосфера, приятная музычка, прохладные коктейли... Для тех, кому катастрофически этого не хватает - сериал "Спасатели".

programme.title: Суббота
programme.desc: Юмористический сериал, герои которого - простая семья, на одну из суббот которой пришлась пятнадцатая годовщина свадьбы. На празднование такого важного события съезжается чуть ли не вся семья - дом ломится от родственников. В результате, праздник выходит из-под контроля, и по определенным причинам гостям приходится задержаться дольше, чем кто-либо мог ожидать. Интересно, что некоторые герои украинского сериала на 1+1 были бы не против быстрее уехать домой, но получается так, что каждую субботу происходит нечто, что заставляет задержаться их еще на неделю - и так каждый раз. Как долго один дом сможет выдержать такое количество гостей? А как насчет его хозяев?

programme.title: Дизель-шоу
programme.desc: Каждый выпуск "Дизель-шоу" - это час настоящего народного юмора в исполнении блестящих резидентов шоу. Среди участников "Дизель-шоу" талантливые актеры, известные КВНщики и самобытные шоумены. Вся команда, бесспорно, прекрасно чувствует друг друга, а потому так легко и непринужденно дарит хорошее настроение своим зрителям. Концерты Дизель-шоу давно уже стали желанным событием в каждом городе Украины, а поэтому билеты на такие мероприятия раскупаются мгновенно. Поэтому лучше купить билеты заранее.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Главные события сериала разворачиваются в столице до появления Национальной полиции, во время волны резонансных преступлений. За расследование запутанных дел берется лучший оперативник города, нетипичный майор и любимчик женщин Виктор Таран. Объявив войну криминальному миру, он переходит дорогу руководству, влиятельным авторитетам и завистливым коллегам.

programme.title: Папа попал
programme.desc: Вас приветствует самое весёлое семейное телешоу "Папа попал". По правилам проекта участником шоу может стать абсолютно любой мужчина, у которого есть уставшая от жизни и бытовых проблем жена, а также минимум двое детей. В то время, как супруга уезжает отдыхать на далёкий и красивый курорт, ее муж начинает принимать на себя все обязанности своей благоверной. На протяжении 7 дней папа должен будет выполнять абсолютно все задания и поручения, которые обычно выполняет его жена. Уборка, стирка, поход за покупками, воспитание детей и поддержание уюта в доме - всё это теперь ляжет на сильные плечи украинских пап. Более того, участники шоу должны будут сделать еще и множество чисто мужских работ, которые долгие годы их просили выполнить их супруги. Починить забор, поклеить обои, отремонтировать автомобиль или научить ребёнка танцевать - всё это также ляжет на плечи наших мужчин-участников. Папа может? Посмотрим!

programme.title: Свадьба вслепую
programme.desc: Право быть счастливым имеет каждый. Но не каждый может осуществить его. "Свадьба вслепую" - это уникальный украинский социальный проект, который поможет разбитым сердцам создать новую крепкую семью. Однако его создатели сразу предупреждают о том, что даже у самой идеальной пары на проекте не всегда гарантирован успех в развитии отношений друг с другом.

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: Gaidām ciemos!
programme.desc: "Gaidām ciemos!" ir par dažādu valstu kultūru, vēsturi un tradīcijām. Raidījuma vadītājs Zurabs Dvaļi ceļo un aicina skatītājus kopā ar viņu pastaigāties pa skaistām vietām, novērtēt apskates vietas, apbrīnot dabu un satikt interesantus cilvēkus. Skatītāji vispirms uzzinās interesantus vēstures faktus par dažādu valstu slavenākajiem vai aizmirstākajiem reģioniem, bet pēc tam izzinās kulinārijas tradīcijas, kopā ar raidījuma viesiem gatavojot vairākus ēdienus.

programme.title: Manas jaunās mājas Latgale
programme.desc: Aivars Baranovskis savulaik strādāja banku struktūrā — sākumā nesa smagos maisus ar naudu, vēlāk strādāja ar dokumentiem un projektu sagatavošanu. Tagad viņš ir mākslinieks un izstāžu kurators, kurš pēc daudziem gadiem Rīgā atgriezies dzimtajā Daugavpilī, lai veidotu radošu vidi un attīstītu laikmetīgās keramikas jomu Latgalē. Viņš ir aktīvi iesaistīts Latvijas Laikmetīgās keramikas centrā, Rotko muzejā un piedalās nozīmīgos starptautiskos projektos. Aivars nedaudz mīl skandalozas izstādes un izaicinājumus, kas liek skatītājiem domāt un diskutēt. Raidījums iepazīstina skatītājus ar Aivara profesionālo ceļu — no banku sektora un sabiedrisko attiecību jomas līdz tam, ka viņš vēlējies vairāk laika veltīt mākslai un radošajiem projektiem. Raidījums rāda, kā viņa pieredze un izglītība palīdz vadīt mākslas projektus, kurēt izstādes un veidot Latgales kultūras infrastruktūru. Aivars dalās pārdomās par identitāti, laikmetīgās mākslas potenciālu Latgalē un to, kā viņš kā kurators un mākslinieks iedvesmo vietējo sabiedrību, apvienojot estētiku, kontekstu un sabiedrības reakciju. Skatītāji uzzinās arī par Aivara radošo procesu un viņa pieeju keramikai. Video akcentē Daugavpils cietokšņa lomu kā radošo domu telpu un atklāj, kā Latgale, pateicoties Aivara darbam, var kļūt par Pasaules keramikas centru, piesaistot radošus cilvēkus un veicinot kultūras attīstību.

programme.title: Trīs kvadrātā
programme.desc: Atklāto sarunu cikla "Trīs kvadrātā" astotajā raidījumā Mārtiņš Vilsons tiksies ar trīs paaudžu ielu mākslas pārstāvjiem. Jaunāko laikmetīgo mūziķu paaudzi pārstāvēs jaunpienācējs Latvijas ielu mākslā Riko. Riko ir dzimis radošā ģimenē un pievērsies vizuālās mākslas izpausmēm un ielu mākslai, kas saskan ar pusaudža vecumam atbilstošām modes tendencēm. Riko ir nolēmis savu personību neatklāt, ļaujot par sevi runāt darbiem, tāpēc raidījumā jaunais mākslinieks būs redzams maskā. Riko dalīsies sajūtās par pirmajiem soļiem ielu mākslā un atklās, kādas vērtības viņam tajā šķiet saistošas, kā arī izskaidros, kāpēc ielu māksla nav tikai ķēpājumi, bet gan - vienota mākslas telpa ar vēstījumu. Vidējās paaudzes lomā uz sarunu tiks aicināts klasiskās mākslas - gleznošanas un ielu mākslas lielformāta nozares, sienu gleznojumu jeb tā dēvēto murāļu - veidotājs Ēriks Caune. Ēriks ir Latvijas Mākslas akadēmijas vieslektors. Mākslinieks ir uzvarējis vairākos mākslas konkursos gan Latvijā, gan ārpus valsts robežām un veidojis atzinīgi novērtētus lielformāta sienu gleznojumus vairākās vietās Latvijā. Sarunā Ēriks atklās, kā patiesībā top grandioza izmēra mākslas darbi un kādi ir viņa lielākie radošie izaicinājumi. Kā lielu mākslas leģenda sarunai pievienosies leģendāra personība Latvijas ielu mākslā, kuras vadībā tiešā un netiešā vadībā attīstījusies Latvijas ielu māksla un grafiti žanrs Aleksandrs Mališs. Aleksands ir viens no ielu mākslas žanra aizsācējiem bijušajā Padomu savienībā. Viņš ir arī dejotājs, šovmenis, uzņēmējs un grafiti festivāla un ielu mākslas festivālu rīkotājs. Sarunā Aleksandrs pārsteigs ar trillera cienīgiem stāstiem par bēgšanu no tiesībsargājošām instancēm un krimināli riskanto ielu mākslas žanra sākuma posmu.

programme.title: Reģionālās Televīzijas piedāvā
programme.desc: 02:15 Jēkabpils laiks (Vidusdaugavas TV); 02:30 Skats no Ventspils (Kurzemes TV); 02:45 TV Kurzeme piedāvā; 03:00 Vakar, šodien, rīt (TV9 Pakalni)

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: Āzija
programme.desc: Pamira kirgīzi ir mūsdienu nomadi: simtiem gadu viņi dzīvoja kalnos Afganistānā, bet arvien biežāk atgriežas dzimtenē Kirgizstānā. Viņus dēvē par izturīgākajiem cilvēkiem uz zemes, jo viņi ir pieraduši dzīvot sarežģītos apstākļos augstienēs, ar bargām ziemām un tveicīgi karstām vasarām.

programme.title: Meža veča emuāri
programme.desc: Šoreiz Māris Olte dosies ciemos pie cilvēka, kuru nenobiedēja bērnības vasaras lauku darbos, tieši otrādi, atmiņas par bērnību iedvesmoja paša spēka gados rūpēties par savas dzimtas mežu. Darot sirdsdarbu, atklājot alternatīvas meža kopšanas iespējas un izprotot koku dažādību, spējis izveidot skaistu mežu.

programme.title: Tikšanās vieta. Valmieras novads
programme.desc: Vēlies uzzināt kas notiek Valmieras novadā? Šis ir raidījums, kurā par to vari uzzināt visu. Aktualitātes, jaunumi un notikumi.

programme.title: ReTV Ziņas
programme.desc: Informācijas līderis reģionos - ReTV. Jaunākās ziņas katru darbdienu 15.00, 19.00 un 21.00.

programme.title: Copes lietas
programme.desc: Divu azartisku makšķernieku piedzīvojumi Latvijas un citu zemju ūdeņos. Iepazīsimies ar visiem makšķerēšanas veidiem - no pludiņa līdz pat mušai, ieskatoties gan pašā makšķerēšanas procesā, gan arī katra makšķerēšanas stila inventāra apguvē.

programme.title: Ģimenes skola
programme.desc: Mājokļa iegāde un pieejamība Latvijā. Ar kādiem iziacinājumiem ģimenes saskaras brīdi, kad vēlas iegādāties jaunu mājokli. Cik viegli ir atrast un iegādāties jaunu mājokli un kādas ir atbalsta programmas ģimenēm mājokļa iegādei.

programme.title: Ģimenes skola
programme.desc: Sabiedriskā līdzdalība. Tikko esam aizvadījuši vēlēšanu dienu un jau gadiem runājam - vēlētāju aktivitāte Latvijā ir zema. Vai un kā to mainīt, domājot par jaunāko paaudzi? Vai ģimene jau mazotnē atvasēm var mācīt būt gan sabiedriski aktīviem un līdzdarbties ne tikai valstisku lēmumu pieņemšanā, bet kas saistoši sava pagasta vai novada mērogā. Ar ko sākt?

programme.title: Svētku kūka
programme.desc: Šonedēļ taps viena no vērtīgākajām kūkām - citronu kūka, jo citroni ir jāēd! Kūku versiju ir daudz, taču Ilze Kupča Kūciņa piedāvās savu kūkas redzējumu. Tā būs maiga, garda un veselīga. Bet arī šoreiz uz sarunu viesis nāks ciemos pie Ilzes. Būs sarunas par mūziku ar čella solisti, komponisti un virtuozu mākslinieci Ernu Daugavieti. Erna Daugaviete — viena no izcilākajām Latvijas čellistēm, plaši pazīstama ar emocionāli dziļajām un tehniski precīzajām interpretācijām. Komponiste, kura ar īpašu spēju spēj radīt vesela orķestra skanējumu. Erna spēlē bez notīm, aranžē mūziku šeit un tagad. Ilze un Erna ar kūku sarunās par dzīvi.

programme.title: Līdaku ielenktie
programme.desc: ReTV ar prieku piedāvā skatītājiem pirmo Latvijā tapušo dokumentālo piedzīvojumu TV seriālu makšķerniekiem! Tas būs saistošs gan mūsu lielajai copmaņu komūnai, gan arī dabas piedzīvojumu cienītājiem. Seriālā atspoguļotas sešu pieredzējušu piedzīvojumu meklētāju-makšķernieku gaitas, pirmo reizi dodoties ar mašīnām un jumta teltīm Norvēģijas virzienā, meklējot tās mazskartajos ūdeņos līdakas, foreles un citas zivis. Pirms došanās ceļā pavadītas daudz stundas, rūpīgi pētot kartes, ūdeņus, makšķernieku forumus Latvijā un Novēģijā, kā arī ievācot informāciju no tiem retajiem Latvijas makšķerniekiem, kas pabijuši Norvēģijas iekšzemes ūdeņos, meklējot līdakas un citas zivis. Salikts plāns, kura viena no stabilākajām un nemainīgajām lietām ir… pārmaiņas, pielāgošanās apstākļiem, nezināmajam un neparedzamajam. 10 dienās džeki saskārās gan ar copi, gan necopi, gan izmisumu, gan plānu maiņu, gan viegliem, gan grūtiem lēmumiem un visu citu, kas piestāv šādam ceļojumam.

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: Mēs darām tā
programme.desc: Katrs no videostāstiem seko līdzi galveno varoņu dienas gaitām, īpašu vērību pievēršot viņu iestrādātajai zaļā dzīvesstila rutīnai, kas saistīta gan ar saimniekošanu mājās, darbā un dārzā, atkritumu šķirošanu, enerģijas avotu un transporta izvēli, ēšanas paradumiem, darba pienākumu organizēšanu un atpūtu. Tie ļauj ielūkoties, piemēram, šobrīd Rīgā lielākās apkaimes biedrības pārstāvju ikdienā, kuri Grīziņkalnā rūpējas par zaļas un labiekārtotas ārtelpas izveidi, kā arī Pierīgas novadu mājsaimniecībās, vērtējot dažādu apkures veidu efektivitāti un draudzīgumu videi, dažādu mākslinieku saimniekošanas paradumos u.c. Raidījumu vada aktrise un kostīmu māksliniece Madara Botmane, iepazīstinot ar planētai draudzīga dzīvesstila ikdienas paradumiem Latvijas kopienās, komūnās, kolektīvos, apkaimēs un vairāku paaudžu ģimeņu mājvietās.

programme.title: Reģionālās Televīzijas piedāvā
programme.desc: 09:15 Jēkabpils laiks (Vidusdaugavas TV); 09:30 Skats no Ventspils (Kurzemes TV); 09:45 TV Kurzeme piedāvā; 10:00 Vakar, šodien, rīt (TV9 Pakalni)

programme.title: Tikšanās vieta. Valmieras novads
programme.desc: Vēlies uzzināt kas notiek Valmieras novadā? Šis ir raidījums, kurā par to vari uzzināt visu. Aktualitātes, jaunumi un notikumi.

programme.title: Zaļā gaisma
programme.desc: Auto, drošība uz ceļa, jaunāko noteikumu un likumu skaidrojumi. Raidījumā pastāstīsim par jaunākajām aktualitātēm, kas jāzina un jāņem vērā katram autovadītājam.

programme.title: Ceturtā vara
programme.desc: Raidījumā "Ceturtā vara" skaidrosim, kāda ir Latvijas situācija dažādās interneta platformās, lai iegūtu viltus popularitāti ar sekotāju pirkšanu. Vai Latvijā ir iespējams tos iegādāties? Kā arī skaidrosim, kādam mērķim cilvēki tādu vēlās. Kā ierasts, raidījuma vadītājs Toms Bergs veiks eksperimentu un satiks dažādus ekspertus, lai skaidrotu, kādi ir riski viltus popularitātei un kā pārbaudīt, vai konta vai ieraksta popularitāte ir īsta, vai mākslīga/nopirkta.

programme.title: Ceturtā vara
programme.desc: Raidījumā "Ceturtā vara" kopā ar dažādu jomu ekspertiem skaidrosim, cik droši varam justies internetā un cik ievainojami esam. Tiksimies ar drošības ekspertiem, lai soli pa solim izietu cauri drošības uzstādījumiem raidījuma vadītāja iepriekš izveidotajiem viltus kontiem. Skaidrosim risku un seku sakarības, kas saistīti ar drošību internetā. Raidījuma vadītājs Toms Bergs izzinās, cik izplatīti Latvijā ir hakeru uzbrukumi privātpersonām un uzņēmumiem, kā arī valsts pārvaldes iestādēm, un ar kādiem mērķiem uzbrukumi tiek veikti. Kā arī skaidrosim, vai šādi uzbrukumi ir iespējami ikvienam, un atklāsim, ar kādiem riskiem saistāmas nākotnes tendences.

programme.title: DoMMājas stāsti
programme.desc: JAUNA SEZONA! Raidījuma DoMMājas stāsti 2. sezonas 1. epizodē Aija Iesalniece sarunājas ar "Ķelmēnu" ceptuves vadītāju Rūtu Mūrnieci. Rūta ceptuvi sāka vadīt, iepriekš to neplānojusi, un arī nozari vēl ne līdz galam pārzinot. Sarunā ar Aiju viņa pastāstīs, kā mācījusies no saviem darbiniekiem, kā strādājusi pie sadarbības un ieklausīšanās komandā, kā pati meklē izaugsmes ceļus un iespējas, kā izmanto uzņēmējdarbības reģionā sniegtās priekšrocības un kas arvien rada lielākos izaicinājumus.

programme.title: Piedzīvojums dabā
programme.desc: Piedzīvojumu meklētājs Jānis Kļaviņš dodas jaunajā un vēl nezināmajā, izpētot dabu pārgājienos. Cilvēks ir viena no vides sastāvdaļām, kas veido to kopumu. Ar piemēriem vēlamies parādīt, kā cilvēks var, veiksmīgi integrējoties vidē, vadīt savu saimniecisko darbību. Veidot cilvēku izpratni, dodoties Latvijas dabā, izglītojot un informējot iespējami plašu sabiedrības daļu par dažādo ekosistēmu un sniedzot praktiskus padomus, kā izmantot dabas resursus, nepiesārņojot un saglabājot vides kvalitāti.

programme.title: ReTV Ziņas
programme.desc: Informācijas līderis reģionos - ReTV. Jaunākās ziņas katru darbdienu 15.00, 19.00 un 21.00.

programme.title: Dzīves ceļojums
programme.desc: Olga Dreģe ir viena no tautā mīlētākajām Latvijas aktrisēm, kura skatuvei veltījusi visu savu dzīvi. Viņa nāk no lielas ģimenes, kas pārdzīvojusi kara gadus, tomēr saglabājusi ticību un spēju saskatīt gaišo arī grūtībās. Ticība Dievam Olgas dzīvē kļuvusi par iekšēju balstu, kas palīdzējis gan mākslā, gan personīgajā ceļā. Šonedēļ raidījumā "Dzīves ceļojums" viņa dalīsies savā pieredzē un sajūtās par to, kas veidojis viņu kā cilvēku un mākslinieci.

programme.title: Limbažu novads rada un dara
programme.desc: Par aktualitātēm Limbažu novadā.

programme.title: Manas bērnības atmiņas
programme.desc: Rundāles pils ir viena no skaistākajām vietām Latvijā. Raitis Zapackis te tiksies ar pils sirdi un dvēseli Imantu Lancmani, lai runātu par bērnības garšām, dabu, ģimeni un blēņām. Imants Lancmanis ir latviešu mākslas vēsturnieks, heraldikas, mākslas un arhitektūras pieminekļu restaurēšanas speciālists un iniciators, gleznotājs, vairāku grāmatu autors, sabiedrisks darbinieks un Triju zvaigžņu ordeņa kavalieris, galvenokārt pazīstams ar savu devumu mūža garumā Rundāles pils atjaunošanā.

programme.title: ReTV Ziņas
programme.desc: Informācijas līderis reģionos - ReTV. Jaunākās ziņas katru darbdienu 15.00, 19.00 un 21.00.

programme.title: Cittautieša dziesma Latvijai
programme.desc: Latvijā ir brīnum skaista daba un esam čakla, strādīga tauta, raidījuma ciklā "Cittautieša dziesma Latvijai" iepazīsim citu valstu mentalitāti, kuri dzimuši citā valstī un izvēlējušies par par savu mājvietu saukt Latviju. Pirmajā raidījumā "Cittautieša dziesma Latvijai" dosimies uz Sedu pie Viktorijas, lai uzzinātu kā ieintegrējusies Latvijas sabiedrībā, kādiem izaicinājumiem ir pakļauta un kas viņu iedvesmo būt vienam no mums, latvietim!

programme.title: Veselības kompass
programme.desc: Raidījums stāstīs par dažādiem ar veselību saistītiem jautājumiem, sniegs padomus un vedīs tevi ceļā uz veselīgāku dzīvesveidu, labāku pašsajūtu un priecīgāku ikdienu! Katru nedēļu uz sarunu aicināsim dažādus jomas ekspertus un kopā gan sportosim, gan apspriedīsim dažādas ar veselību saistītas tēmas, gan arī izmēģināsim daudz kā jauna un mūsu veselībai noderīga!

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.
